Larry Page praised Eric Schmidt for an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade.`` There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly, he said.`` Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him.
